question: Who has won the best actor award at the 2018 Dadasaheb Phalke Awards?
explanation: Akshay Kumar has bagged the best actor award at the 2018 Dadasaheb Phalke awards for his role in \'Padman (Jury)\' and for \'Toilet: Ek Prem Katha\'. The awards were given by Dadasaheb Phalke Film Foundation in Mumbai on April 29. Bhumi Pednekar won the best actress trophy for her work in Toilet Ek Prem Katha. Manisha Koirala won the ‘Most Versatile Actress’ award. Whereas,veteran actor-director Rakesh Roshan was given the lifetime achievement award for his contribution to the industry as an actor, producer and a director. Meanwhile, veteran actor Farida Jalal was awarded the Saraswatibai Dadasaheb Phalke Best actress (Lifetime) award for her contribution to the film industry.
